name: Masterpiece Europe - the European Association of Traditional Tailoring Professionals
goal: Masterpiece Europe, the European Association of Traditional Tailoring Professionals, is a non-profit, membership-based organisation that connects, supports and represents the traditional tailoring professionals from across the European Economic Area.
interests: Consumers, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Cultural policy, educational policy, youth, youth unemployment, entrepreneurship, single market
